item.title: CVE-2023-20666|2024-08-02T09:14:39.893Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6789%2C%20mt6855%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt8188%2C%20mt8195%2C%20mt8365%2C%20mt8781%2C%20mt8795t%2C%20mt8798
item.description: In display drm, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07310651; Issue ID: ALPS07292173.
